name: Lost Soul (vo0do0)
description:
GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022 - Death Is Only The Beginning themed little platform game

Tutorial dialogs doesnt lie, arrow key for left and right, spacebar to jump.

Whole thing (maybe except for few small things) was recorded on stream

https://www.twitch.tv/voodoogamingstudio - check me out I will make make some features :)
